newsitem.title: USA: Grand Island, Neb., yields 4.40 pct in 2000.
newsitem.headline: Grand Island, Neb., yields 4.40 pct in 2000.

text.p: Chiles Heider Division of Smith Barney Inc said it priced $18.185 million of Grand Island, Neb., electric system revenue refunding bonds, Series 1996 with a top yield of 4.40 percent in 2000.
